name: files_remote_share
description: Share a remote file into a channel.

file.description: Specify a file registered with Slack by providing its ID. Either this field or `external_id` or both are required.

external_id.description: The globally unique identifier (GUID) for the file, as set by the app registering the file with Slack.  Either this field or `file` or both are required.

channels.description: Comma-separated list of channel IDs where the file will be shared.

$block: This method either only returns a brief _OK_ response or a verbose schema is not available for this method.
This method either only returns a brief _not OK_ response or a verbose schema is not available for this method.
